data.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge Plus Full Specs, PreOrder Date & Accessories Prices Leaked
data.meta_description:
I like the wallpaper in the first screenshot.

Nothing fancy here...Since I have been using the Note Edge all of my widgets that were on my home screens...
data.text:
You kinda just made his point by saying you use a launcher on your Nexus. The fact of the matter is, you're adding all of these "extras" to your Nexus that TW has baked in. I've seen enough side by side comparisons with the Nexus 5 and S5 and Nexus 6 vs S6 and Nexus 6 vs Note 4 to know better.

and for those "occasional" times when the Nexus is faster, it's so minuscule, you can hardly use those situations to call TW a resource hog.

But hey, you're happy with yours and I'm happy with mine, its all good. Having a choice is what matters.

S5 tap'n

I get what they are trying to convey about loading a Launcher on top of stock Android and still not experiencing lag, but I'm not experiencing any issues at all on my Note Edge. Neither did I on my S4 (Exynos) or my Note 3 (Exynos). Maybe I am just not bothered by the micro second it takes to switch between apps or maybe their Note 4 has issues?

You kinda just made his point by saying you use a launcher on your Nexus. The fact of the matter is, you're adding all of these "extras" to your Nexus that TW has baked in. I've seen enough side by side comparisons with the Nexus 5 and S5 and Nexus 6 vs S6 and Nexus 6 vs Note 4 to know better.

and for those "occasional" times when the Nexus is faster, it's so minuscule, you can hardly use those situations to call TW a resource hog.

But hey, you're happy with yours and I'm happy with mine, its all good. Having a choice is what matters.

S5 tap'n

You still don't get it, TW is a resource hog, Nova Launcher is not, two different things, I also use Nova Launcher on the Note 4, it still does not take away from the fact that TW is just horrid. The Note 4 has the same hardware as the Nexus 6 but is crippled by the TW overlay, the Note 4 is a nice device but should be better than it is, as attested by the Nexus 6 which has the same hardware but runs smoother than the Note 4, which should not be the case, but it is. I am not the only one saying this, it's all over the www, by many top review sights. Nova is just a Launcher not a software skin built into the OS like TW is that takes away from what the Note 4 should be. It's as obvious as night from day, TW just blows. Also the front speakers on the Nexus 6 makes the back speaker on the Note 4 seem like a joke.

Sent from my Nexus 6 using Tapatalk
